description_jp:
次に発動するSP特技で獲得するボルテージが自身のアピールの20%増加
条件:作戦変更時 確率:30%
description_en:
Voltage gained from next SP Skill increases by 20% of own Appeal.
Condition: On Strategy Switch, 30% chance

effect.display: Gain 20% of Appeal as extra Voltage on next SP skill
effect.formatting: Gain {effect} of Appeal as extra Voltage on next SP skill
